name: A Night at Calawah Cabin
description:
A Night at Calawah Cabin is a game about Billy Trout, a radioactivity researcher. Following reports of radioactive material contaminating the area, Billy goes to investigate. What will he find?

This game is honestly not the best. The dash feature is a bit buggy, though not too bad. The main issue is the camera switcher- there is a big where if you stand right inbetween a switcher it can get confused on what screen you're supposed to go to, and switches the camera incorrectly. Try not to dash too much near borders. I would have made a level two, but building the switcher and dash took so long that I didn't.
